fixes.name: # Complaints (Selected)
fixes.dax_expression:
VAR SelectedParam = SELECTEDVALUE('Selected Product'[Display As])
VAR ProdGrouping = SELECTEDVALUE('complaints'[Product Grouping])
RETURN
IF(ProdGrouping = SelectedParam, 'complaints'[Number of Complaints])
fixes.solution_explanation: Replaced ATTR([Product Grouping]) with SELECTEDVALUE('complaints'[Product Grouping]). Replaced the parameter [Parameters].[Selected Product] with SELECTEDVALUE('Selected Product'[Display As]). Kept the referenced calculated field 'Number of Complaints' as 'complaints'[Number of Complaints] (COUNTD in Tableau -> DISTINCTCOUNT measure in Power BI). Implemented logic to return the count only when product grouping matches the selected parameter.
fixes.type_changed_reason: The calculation references a parameter and uses an aggregation (COUNTD for Number of Complaints), so it must be created as a measure.
